page.title: 12THE CARAVAN SITE
page.content: Grange Caravan Park is near the Solent Industrial Estate,Hedge End.Before 1967 when it was built, it was open fields and a military camp.Now it consists of 154 permanent caravans each with a garden.In the centre of the site is an open area for tourist caravans and also a shop. Caravans get their electricity and water the same way as a house, but the gas comes from bottles.Some people live there because they cannot afford anything else and others because they enjoy it.It is easier for older and disabled people because there are no steps or stairs.It is especially good for old people because there is less to dust and clean.The good thing is you can stay in the site as long as you like unless it closes down.
